subject: USB connectivity
description_text:
Good morning,

Do you recommend using a USB Type A 3.2 or USB Type A 2.0 for connecting the
pedals to the computer or does it not make any difference

 

Best regards

Sean Kukula

conversations.body_text: Hi Sean,  We recommend using the USB 3.0 (blue) port on the back of your PC, as it provides stable power for the pedals. Please avoid using USB hubs without independent power, as they may cause unstable power supply and affect the pedals’ performance.

Thank you for your quick reply

 

Best regards

Sean Kukula

Competition Supplies Limited
